SystemColumn.Formula:
IF( [Status] = "Submitted", [Extension Period] & " - SUBMITTED",
[Extension Period] & " - " & [End Date Before Exercised] & " to " & [End Date After Exercised] & " - " & UPPER([Status]) )

Column.Name: End Date Before Exercised
End Date After Exercised
SETTINGS
Extension Period
Approval Validation Conflict
Approval Not Required
Tax
Column.Formula:
IF( [Tax Mode] = "Percentage", IF([Tax Percent] = 0, 0, [Extension Value] / 100 * [Tax Percent]),
[Tax Mode] = "Not Applicable", 0,
[Tax] )

Column.Name: Tax Percent
Column.Formula:
IF( [Tax Mode] = "Value", IF([Extension Value] = 0, 0, [Tax] / [Extension Value] * 100),
[Tax Mode] = "Not Applicable", 0,
[Tax Percent] )

Column.Name: Parent Structure
Contract Data

Binding.Expression: HASH_GET([Parent Structure], "Breadcrumb")
[RecordID] > 0
OR( [Source Request for Information RecordID] <> NULL(), [Source Work Order RecordID] <> NULL() )
ARRAY( "Details", "Attachments" )
ARRAY( HASH("value", "Details", "text", ""), HASH("value", "Attachments", "text", "") )

Label.Text: Select the contract(s) you wish to raise an extension for

Binding.Expression: OR( [Status] = "Exercised", [Status] = "Submitted to Contracts" )
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", FALSE//ARRAY_FIRST(EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID)) = "Multiple Award Contract" )

Information.Text:
This is the Current End of the Contract plus duration of any draft or submitted extensions created before this one, that haven't been rejected or cancelled.
Once exercised this date will lock in to represent the current end date at the time of extension exercise.

Label.Text: The sequence of extensions is determined by the order in which they are exercised.

Binding.Expression:
"
"

"
" & HASH_GET([Icons], "Info") & "
"

Label.Text: The effective start date of this extension as calculated by the system
Enter the end date of this extension option

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Pending Submission] <> TRUE, //checks if any child submission record is in draft or submitted [Status] <> "Exercised", [Status] <> "Submitted to Contracts" )

Label.Text: Enter the end date of this extension option

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [End Date Mode] = "Date", [Pending Submission] <> TRUE, //checks if any child submission record is in draft or submitted [Status] <> "Exercised", [Status] <> "Submitted to Contracts" )

Label.Text: Enter the extension duration in years, months, and days

AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Pending Submission] <> TRUE, //checks if any child submission record is in draft or submitted [Status] <> "Exercised", [Status] <> "Submitted to Contracts" )
[Can Add Extension Value] == TRUE

"
"
HASH_GET([Icons], "Info")

Label.Text: This will allow Contract Managers at the Contract level to approve the Extensions individually. Not doing this will require a one time approval which will then apply the Extension to all nominated Contracts.

"
"

"
" & HASH_GET([Icons], "Info") & "
"

Text.String: Apply one-time approval for all extensions

Label.Text: Specify whether each extension requires individual approval at a contract level

Binding.Expression: OR( [Status] = "Submitted to Contracts", [Status] = "Exercised" )
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", FALSE// ARRAY_FIRST(EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID)) = "Multiple Award Contract" )
OR( [Submission RecordIDs] <> NULL(), [Contract RecordIDs] == NULL() )
IF( OR( [Submission RecordIDs] <> NULL(), [Contract RecordIDs] <> NULL() ), "Raise and Submit Contract Level Extensions", "SUBMITTED" )
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Approve at Contract Level] == TRUE, [Approval Not Required] <> TRUE, FALSE//ARRAY_FIRST(EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID)) = "Multiple Award Contract" )

Label.Text: Ensure all required data has been provided before submitting for approval

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Approve at Contract Level] == TRUE, [Approval Not Required] <> TRUE, ARRAY_LENGTH([Submit Check]) > 0 FALSE//ARRAY_FIRST(EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID)) = "Multiple Award Contract" )

TextCriterion.Text: [LineNumber] = 1

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Approve at Contract Level] == TRUE, [Approval Not Required] <> TRUE, FALSE//ARRAY_FIRST(EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID)) = "Multiple Award Contract" )

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Trigger: Approval Events (if approval is not required)

Binding.Expression: OR( [Extension RecordIDs] <> NULL(), [Contract RecordIDs] == NULL() )

IF( [Contract RecordIDs] == NULL(), "No contract selected", [Extension RecordIDs] <> NULL(), "ACTIVATED", "Raise and Activate Contract Level Extensions"
)
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Approve at Contract Level] <> TRUE, [Approval Not Required] = TRUE, FALSE//ARRAY_FIRST(EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID)) = "Multiple Award Contract" )

Label.Text: Ensure all required data has been provided before activating extensions

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Approve at Contract Level] <> TRUE, [Approval Not Required] = TRUE, ARRAY_LENGTH([Submit Check]) > 0, FALSE//ARRAY_FIRST(EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID)) = "Multiple Award Contract" )

"
"

LET $approvalEvents := ARRAY( "The 'Current End Date' on the contract will be extended by the duration of this extension", "The change to the current end date on the contract will be reflected on any draft extensions in the 'Extension Start Date'" ); RETURN "

On approval the following events will happen:

" & "
    " & ARRAY_JOIN( ARRAY_SELECT( $approvalEvents, $(i,item) "
  1. " & HTMLENCODE($item) & "
    2. " )) & "
"
HASH_GET([Icons], "Info")
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Approved by Variation] <> TRUE, [Approve at Contract Level] <> TRUE )
[Status] == "Exercised"

IF( [Status] = "Exercised", "View submission",
[Pending Draft Submission] == TRUE, //checks if any child submission record is in draft or submitted "Prepare approval submission",
[Pending Submission] == TRUE, //checks if any child submission record is in draft or submitted "Check status and details",
[Submission Count] >=1, "Prepare resubmission",
"Prepare approval submission" )

OR( [Submission Count] > 0, AND( [Approval Reference Number] = NULL, [Navigation] = "Details", [Approved by Variation] <> TRUE, [Approval Not Required] <> TRUE, [Approve at Contract Level] <> TRUE ) )

Label.Text: Ensure all required data has been provided before submitting for approval

Binding.Expression: AND( [Approval Reference Number] = NULL, [Navigation] = "Details", [Approved by Variation] <> TRUE, [Approval Not Required] <> TRUE, [Approve at Contract Level] <> TRUE, ARRAY_LENGTH([Submit Check]) > 0 )

TextCriterion.Text: [Type] = 'Extension'

CASE WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved (Final)' THEN '#0b732b'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Rejected' THEN '#900000'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Pending' THEN '#ffffff'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'In Progress' THEN '#ffff00'
ELSE '#efefef' END

CASE WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved (Final)' THEN 'white'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Rejected' THEN 'white'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Cancelled' THEN '#b3b3b3'
WHEN [Status] = 'Approved' THEN '#0b732b'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved' THEN '#00a06d'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'In Progress' THEN 'black'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Pending' THEN 'black'
ELSE 'black' END

Binding.Expression: [Submission Count]>1

LET $set := ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(1, [Submission Count]), $(i,item) HASH( "value", $item, "text", $item ) );
RETURN ARRAY_CONCAT( HASH("value", 0, "text", "All"), $set )
[Submission Count] > 1
AND( [Submission Count] > 0, [Navigation] = "Details" )
[Status] = "Approved"
IF( [Status] = "Exercised", "Activated", "Activate" )
[Status] = "Approved"

Label.Text: Enter a reference number for approvals that happened outside of the system

Binding.Expression: OR( [Approval Reference Number] <> NULL, AND( [Submission Count] = 0, [Navigation] = "Details", [Approved by Variation] <> TRUE, [Approval Not Required] = TRUE, [Approve at Contract Level] <> TRUE ) )

Label.Text: Ensure all required data has been provided before activating extension

Binding.Expression: AND( [Submission Count] = 0, [Navigation] = "Details", [Approved by Variation] <> TRUE, [Approval Not Required] = TRUE, [Approve at Contract Level] <> TRUE, ARRAY_LENGTH([Submit Check]) > 0 )
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Status] = "Draft" )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Clear Contract RecordID(s) and Contract Number

"
"

LET $cancellationEvents := ARRAY( "This extensions will be unlinked from the contract. It will appear from the contract as if this record does not exist", "You will be navigated back to the contract record" ); RETURN "

On cancellation, the following events will happen:

" & "
    " & ARRAY_JOIN( ARRAY_SELECT( $cancellationEvents, $(i,item) "
  1. " & HTMLENCODE($item) & "
    2. " )) & "
"
HASH_GET([Icons], "Warning")
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Status] = "Draft" )
ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Document Name]) > [LineNumber]
[Name of EDRMS] & " references"
AND( [Navigation] = "Attachments", [External EDRMS] == TRUE )
AND( [Navigation] = "Attachments", [Document Upload] == TRUE )
FALSE/*EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE( EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "System Builders" )*/
FALSE/*EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE( EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "System Builders" )*/
FALSE/*EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE( EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "System Builders" )*/

TextCriterion.Text: (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR GET_USER_POSITION(CURRENT_USER) = 'COO' OR GET_USER_POSITION(CURRENT_USER) = 'CPO' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators'
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1)>0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators'
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1)>0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
-- If Contract RecordID is not populated, fall back to allow Originator access WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
-- Check if user is listed in role on parent record WHEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CASE -- Check if the user is in one of these roles - they should always have read access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE -- Check the value of Restricted on the Contract - if not true, these users can access in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for this record WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
-- If Contract RecordID is not populated, fall back to allow Originator access WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
-- Check if user is listed in role on parent record WHEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
ELSE FALSE END
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] = [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] = [RecordID] AND [Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for this record WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Executive Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1)>0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers'
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(1)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Risk Managers'

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Extension", "[Status] = 'Exercised'", HASH( "sort", "[Date Approved] DESC", "parent", ARRAY("Contract", [Contract RecordID]) ) )
IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Vendor Access Enabled", "Contract", "[RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Contract RecordID]) ), NULL() )
IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Enabled Vendor Actions", "Contract", "[RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Contract RecordID]) ), NULL() )

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Refresh not exercised Extensions - this is required to make sure all extension dates are calculated properly

FieldEntry.Formula: HASH_GET($eventargs, "Previous Submission Round")//this will be 0 for the first round of submission + 1
HASH_GET($eventargs, "Previous Submission RecordID") //it will be null for the first roundof submission

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Call: Link Next Round (on last submission)
